lines.text: With the team we'll have next year Jesus Christ would be flat out making the reserves!

[referring to Geoff]
He's been up his mum and his legless sister and he thinks he's killed his old man!
[Geoff has arrived late at a training session]

[to another player]
I hope he's insured.
A marvelous high mark you took last Saturday. You just seemed to go up and up!
A Greek guy who could really jump
Ah, yeah yeah. Well some of these new Australians, you know they could be real champions, if they forget about soccer and just learn to assimulate
